main.java.edu.sagado.genAlg
Class Chromo<T>

java.lang.Object
  main.java.edu.sagado.genAlg.Chromo<T>

public class Chromo<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A Chromo is the basic unit of the genetic population. Each Chromo consists of a Generic ArrayList (genes) and a fitness score.

Constructor Summary
Chromo(java.util.ArrayList<T> genes, double fitness)
          Create a new Chromo described by genes, with the specific fitness
Chromo(int size)
          Create a new Chromo with an empty ArrayList and 0 fitness
